publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8186 Stuart McMillan: OYT Royal Supporters—That the Parliament congratulates Ocean Youth Trust UK (OYT UK) on being selected by Prince William and Catherine Middleton to receive support from the royal wedding charitable fund; recognises that the fund has been set up to receive donations from anyone considering giving the royal couple a wedding gift; notes that OYT UK is one of 26 beneficiaries and has been chosen for what it considers to be the excellent initiatives that it undertakes with young people; further notes that the fund will assist OYT Scotland in continuing to engage young people in Scotland in Adventure Under Sail schemes, and suggests that those wishing to make a donation visit http://www.royalweddingcharityfund.org/. R
S3M-8186 OYT Royal Supporters (lodged on 16 March 2011) Margaret Mitchell*, Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*, Jackie Baillie*, Stewart Maxwell*

S3M-8186 Stuart McMillan: OYT Royal Supporters—That the Parliament congratulates Ocean Youth Trust UK (OYT UK) on being selected by Prince William and Catherine Middleton to receive support from the royal wedding charitable fund; recognises that the fund has been set up to receive donations from anyone considering giving the royal couple a wedding gift; notes that OYT UK is one of 26 beneficiaries and has been chosen for what it considers to be the excellent initiatives that it undertakes with young people; further notes that the fund will assist OYT Scotland in continuing to engage young people in Scotland in Adventure Under Sail schemes, and suggests that those wishing to make a donation visit http://www.royalweddingcharityfund.org/. R Supported by: Margaret Mitchell, Jamie McGrigor, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper, Jackie Baillie, Stewart Maxwell
